html.author: Tim Harford
html.description: Challenges and problems can derail your creative process ... or they can make you more creative than ever. In the surprising story behind the best-selling solo piano album of all time, Tim Harford may just convince you of the advantages of having to work with a little mess.
html.keywords: TED, talks, cognitive science, collaboration, composing, creativity, innovation, music, potential, psychology, success, work
html.title: Cancel search
